question_stem: If the patient has been hospitalized for an asthma attack in the past year, how will this affect the probability of Bronchospasm / acute asthma exacerbation?
para_steps: The patient has been hospitalized for an asthma attack in the past year.|This changes organ function and clinical stability.|This affects the patient's immune and inflammatory responses.|This changes organ function and clinical stability.|As a result, the probability of Bronchospasm / acute asthma exacerbation is more likely.
cause_event: the patient has been hospitalized for an asthma attack in the past year
